WorkItem.Description: Im showing hit capped at 149 in 2.1.1 but thats not the hitcap at 80. Im assuming this is due to the ret module not being updated for level 80 values yet.
WorkItem.Summary: [Retribution] Boss level / Character level not changeable

Comments.Message: Still in the update 2.1.2 still cant change Boss level and Hit cap is incorrect. This is a pretty big bug making gear incorrect and making Rawr less then a basic guideline.
Sigh. I don't know why Zurm fails so bad. I'm gunna try to fix it myself.
Nevermind, too much is broken. I'm going to badger Zurm more. Really sorry, Ret pallies.
Thanks for bringing this up, Rawr Ret can't be used until it's fixed

according to http://elitistjerks.com/f76/t37843-retribution_paladin_thread_wrath_3_0_a/   we need   262 hit rating, or 8%, to be hit capped on white swings, specials, and judgements.  as well as  26 Expertise (214 rating, 6.5% ) to remove dodges from the attack table when attacking from behind, as melee often does. anything above is useless ;)
